summary.summary_text: Software developer and data engineer with experience in building production-scale data pipelines, analytics systems, and backend services. Strong programming skills in Python, Java, JavaScript, and C++. Experienced in solving complex technical problems, cross-functional collaboration, and cloud computing technologies. Proven ability to mentor team members and drive process improvements while delivering scalable solutions.

experience.experience_1_title_company_location: Software Developer Intern, Dev Global Services, Vijayawada, India
experience_1_bullets: Built production data pipeline using Python and FastAPI processing 10K+ daily API requests with sub-100ms latency, supporting real-time enrollment analytics for 500+ concurrent users across 3 academic departments with microservices architecture and RESTful APIs

Resolved complex database performance issues by optimizing PostgreSQL via indexing and SQL tuning, reducing data retrieval latency by 40% and enabling instant search across 10K+ student records while ensuring system reliability

Architected and deployed microservices backend achieving 99.9% uptime and zero-downtime deployments, ensuring data quality and system reliability for critical enrollment workflows while collaborating with cross-functional team of 4 engineers in Agile environment
Demonstrated strong communication and time management skills maintaining 85%+ test coverage through CI/CD pipelines
experience.experience_2_title_company_location: UX Design & Web Development Volunteer, University of Florida
experience_2_bullets: Partnered with cross-team of engineers and faculty to architect data warehouse for Yantra educational platform, conducting user research with 50+ students to drive data-informed design decisions and define technical requirements for scalable analytics infrastructure

Designed analytics dashboards using React.js, JavaScript, HTML5, and PostgreSQL to extract insights from engagement data, enabling instructors to optimize content delivery for 1K+ users while implementing web technologies including JSON and AJAX

Drove process improvement initiatives through SQL-based user behavior analysis, identifying friction points that improved navigation efficiency by 35% while mentoring junior team members on data analysis techniques and best practices

project_1_bullets: Architected end-to-end data warehouse and ETL pipeline using Python processing 100K+ e-commerce transactions across 3 years of marketplace data, demonstrating technical leadership in project execution while managing production workflows serving 10K+ daily queries

Deployed analytics system on AWS EC2 with cloud computing infrastructure and automated data quality monitoring, reducing analyst query time by 20% through SQL optimization and performance tuning with <0.1% error rate for real-time dashboards

Developed machine learning model achieving R² = 0.96 for predictive analytics using 5+ engineered features, collaborating with stakeholders to generate insights for seller performance, logistics optimization, and resolving complex technical issues
project_2_bullets: Built scalable backend data pipeline using Node.js, JavaScript, and MongoDB supporting 100+ concurrent users, reducing query response times by 35% through strategic indexing and performance optimization for distributed systems

Integrated Python-based ML model via RESTful API achieving 93% classification accuracy, demonstrating strong cross-functional collaboration with frontend team to define data interfaces, technical specifications, and web technologies integration including JSON and REST APIs
Architected MongoDB schema to support real-time auction workflows, secure authentication processes, and complex problem-solving for scalable systems

education.masters_coursework: Data Engineering, Advanced Data Structures, Algorithms, Database Systems, NLP, Machine Learning, Cloud Computing

achievements_bullets: Demonstrated technical leadership and problem-solving skills by presenting machine learning solution at HERE Technologies Hackathon on Land and House Price Prediction, showcasing predictive analytics expertise and ability to communicate complex technical concepts
Awarded USD 4,500 scholarship during Master's at University of Florida for strong academic record and a 25% merit scholarship during undergraduate studies
